name: UFO Midnight
description:
UFO Midnight

Shoot through waves of enemies while fighting gravity as a UFO. 

There are several enemies, upgrades to collect, and 2 boss fights.

The game is quite difficult but can be beaten in around 10 minutes if completed in one try.

Controls:

     Up arrow key to fly up

     Left and right Arrow keys to move left and right

     Space bar to shoot

     F to full screen

     P to pause

Upgrades:

      Increases the number of guns

      Heals

      Increases fire rate

if there are any issues with the web version, you can download the game instead.
